infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: MyMacroAI needs access to read your health data to provide personalized nutrition and fitness insights.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: MyMacroAI needs access to write health data like water intake, body weight, and body fat percentage to track your progress.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: MyMacroAI uses the camera to scan barcodes and analyze food for nutrition tracking.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: MyMacroAI uses the microphone for voice-based food logging.
